Verses: 1 isravel Puththirare, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Dhesaththuk Kudigalode Karththarukku Vazhakku Irukkiradhu; Adhenendraal Dhesaththile Unmaiyum Illai, Irakkamum Illai; Dhevanaippatriya Arivum Illai.
2 poiyaanaiyittu, Poisolli, Kolaiseydhu, Thirudi, Vibasaarampanni, Minji Minjippogiraargal; Raththappazhigalode Raththappazhigal Serugiradhu.
3 idhinimiththam Dhesam Pulambum; Adhil Kudiyirukkira Anaivarodunkooda Mirugajeevangalum Aagaayaththup Paravaigalum Thoindhupogum; Kadalin Machchangalum Vaarikkollappadum.
4 aagilum Oruvanum Nyaayaththaikkaanbikkavum, Oruvanum Avargalaik Kadindhukollavum Koodaadhu; Un Janangal Aasaariyanode Vazhakkaadugiravargalaippola Irukkiraargal.
5 aagaiyaal Nee Pagalile Idarivizhuvaai; Iravile Unnodekoodath Theerkkadharisiyum Idarivizhuvaan; Un Thaayai Naan Sangaarampannuven.

6 en Janangal Arivillaamaiyinaal Sangaaramaagiraargal; Nee Arivai Veruththaai Aagaiyaal Nee En Aasaariyanaayiraadhapadikku Naanum Unnai Veruththuviduven; Nee Un Dhevanudaiya Vedhaththai Marandhaai, Aagaiyaal Naanum Un Pillaigalai Marandhuviduven.
7 avargal Evvalavaaip Peruginaargalo, Avvalavaai Enakku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhaargal; Avargaludaiya Magimaiyai Lachchaiyaaga Maarappannuven.
8 avargal En Janaththin Paavaththaith Thindru, Avargaludaiya Akkiramaththinperil Pasidhaagamaayirukkiraargal.
9 aadhalaal Janangalukku Eppadiyo Aasaariyanukkum Appadiye; Avargal Vazhigalinpadi Naan Avargalai Visaariththu, Avargal Kiriyaigalinpadi Avargalukkup Palanalippen.
10 avargal Karththarai Madhiyaamalirukkirapadiyinaal Avargal Thindraalum Thirupthiyadaiyaadhiruppaargal; Avargal Vesiththanampanninaalum Palugaadhiruppaargal.

12 en Janangal Kattaiyinidaththil Aalosanai Ketkiraargal; Avargaludaiya Kol Avargalukku Seydhiyai Arivikkumendrirukkiraargal; Vesiththana Aavi Avargalai Vazhithappith Thiriyappannitru; Avargal Thangal Dhevanukkuk Keezhppattiraamal Soramaarkkam Ponaargal.

13 avargal Malaiyuchchiyil Paliyittu, Medugalile Karvaalimarangalin Keezhum, Punnaimarangalin Keezhum, Arasamarangalin Keezhum, Avaigalin Nizhal Nalladhendru, Thoobankaattugiraargal; Idhinimiththam Ungal Kumaaraththigal Vesiththanamum, Ungal Marumakkalmaar Vibasaaramum Seygiraargal.

14 ungal Kumaaraththigal Vesiththanam Seygiradhinimiththamum, Ungal Marumakkalmaar Vibasaaram Seygiradhinimiththamum, Naan Avargalai Dhandiyaamaliruppeno? Avargal Vilagi Vesigalode Koodappoi Dhaasigalode Paliyidugiraargal; Unarvillaadha Janangal Adhinaal Sikkundu Vizhuvaargal.

15 isravele, Nee Soramponaalum, Yoodhaavaagilum Andhap Paavaththukkullaagaadhiruppadhaaga; Kilkaalukku Varaamalum, Peththaavenukkup Pogaamalumkarththarudaiya Jeevanaanai Endru Aanaiyidaamalum Iruppeergalaaga.
16 isravel Adangaadha Kidaariyaippol Adangaadhirukkiradhu; Ippodhu Karththar Avargalai Visthaaramaana Veliyile Aattukkuttiyaippol Meyndhu Alaiyappannuvaar.
18 avargaludaiya Madhubaanam Puliththadhu, Avargal Eppodhum Sorampogiraargal, Avargaludaiya Adhipadhigal Thaarungalendru Lachchaiyaanadhai Naadugiraargal.
19 kaatru Avargalaith Than Settaigalil Irugap Pidikkum; Avargal Thangal Paligalaal Vetkappaduvaargal.
